alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Beaver, central Lipscomb and eastern Ochiltree Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Floris to 5 miles southwest of Wolf Creek Park. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Darrouzett, Knowles, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Floris, Mocane, Slapout and Balko. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
